Anomalous network traffic patterns to le.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log and http.log for connections to common web services (Google, Microsoft, etc.). Calculate the ratio of bytes_sent to bytes_received for each session/connection. Identify connections where the sent/received ratio is significantly higher than the norm for that service using statistical methods (e.g., Z-score or IQR analysis).

Suspicious process communicating with co.Action: Correlate Windows Event ID 4688 (Process Creation) with Zeek conn.log. Identify connections to common web services originating from processes known to be potentially abused (e.g., powershell.exe, cmd.exe, svchost.exe) when not expected by user activity or system function. Use correlation analysis to link process execution time/host with network connection time/host/destination.
